thread.title: Adele Fangirls Over Emma Stone at the Oscars - Adele's Reaction Over Emma Stone's Oscar Win Is Priceless
thread.title_full: Adele Fangirls Over Emma Stone at the Oscars - Adele's Reaction Over Emma Stone's Oscar Win Is Priceless

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Adele Fangirls Over Emma Stone at the Oscars - Adele's Reaction Over Emma Stone's Oscar Win Is Priceless
text:
Adele was one of the millions who tuned in to watch the Academy Awards last night and, like many Oscar viewers, the singer cheered on La La Land favorite, Emma Stone. When the star was announced as the Best Actress winner, the singer posed next to the TV during her acceptance speech—even in her nightgown—like a true fangirl. "Ah Emma," she swooned over Stone on Instagram. But the singer also honored the (real) Best Picture winner that evening. "And Moonlight, congratulations so so wonderful ⭐️," she added.
Ah Emma ❤️ And Moonlight, congratulations so so wonderful ⭐️
A post shared by @adele on Feb 26, 2017 at 11:02pm PST
